chargeHist.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael S Nord was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: La Crosse County Clerk of Courts

supervisions.notes:
STAYED..//..If revoked, during period of prison incarceration, 25% of the defendant's Prison Inmate funds are to be applied toward restitution owed - per prison policy
.

STAYED - Conditions of Extended Supervision are the same as conditions of Probation that is imposed
.

Probation can be transferred to the State of MN
.

miscConds.notes:
Pay restitution of $1,837.77 to Auto Value Parts store Onalaska

Pay 10% restitution surcharge to the DA's office (see 'other' above)

During period of Probation/Extended Supervision, restitution will be paid under the terms of a payment plan to be established with the PO but calling for no less than 2.5% of gross wages to be paid toward restitution and to be enforced through a wage assignment
.

Obtain and maintain employment or be involved in a course of education
.

Def to undergo Alcohol and Drug Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.
.

No Contact with Value Parts store
.

Comply with any treatment recommended - traumatic brain injury issue along with behavioral health issues

Undergo any other assessments or evaluations deemed appropriate by the PO and follow-through with any treatment recommended

Pay Crime Lab and Drug Assessment fee (see 'other' above for amount)

Pay DOC Supervision fees

If probation/extended supervision is revoke or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of resititution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt

timeConds.notes:
May be served on Electronic Monitoring - def to go to Jusice Support Services after Court to get set up.  See how def can serve this in the State of MN.  Electronic Monitoring to begin in 2 weeks

No sentence credit toward jail sentence
.
